metadata.title: PUMA Kids' Drift Cat III L V Sneaker
features: FOREVER BETTER: PUMA is constantly pushing to be better than we were yesterday.
FOREVER BETTER is our commitment to reduce our environmental impact and work together towards a sustainable future.
description: Your budding athlete will look all the more adorable in this cool, logo-emblazoned leather sneaker from Puma. Accented with an oversized leaping-cat logo on the side, the two-toned design features a generously padded tongue and collar for support, reinforcement at the heel to guard against abrasion, and double hook-and-loop closures to secure the fit. The cushy, cotton-lined footbed lends added comfort and breathability, while the flexible rubber sole provides traction on slippery sidewalks and slick gym floors.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design. The PUMA Kids collection is as if you threw a sweater in the dryer. It has all the style and comfort you'd expect from PUMA--only it's smaller.
